summary: SummaryGhd's Chronos professional curve curling iron and tong with a barrel that uses curl-responsive technology for up to 3x faster curling & HD results that last all day.
details: DetailsBenefitsChronos Curve Classic Iron is recommended for all hair lengthsPerfect for frizz-free curls and waves that lasts all dayNo extreme heat damage*50% more shine*Up to 50% smoother results*Recommended for all hair lengthsFeaturesghd's curl-responsive technology reacts to dynamic curling actions and responds to your hair needs for ultra-fast curling and high-definition results1" barrel makes it perfect for deeper crested waves and tighter, more rounded curlsAnodised coating that provides grip to make styling effortlessLatest generation ceramic heater ensures the optimum styling temperature of 365°F is maintained across the entire barrel at all timesItem 2639016How To UseSection hair and take a 2-inch section.At the root, press to open iron with cool tip facing upwards and wrap hair.Rotate iron one full turn so the hair is wrapped around fully.Glide down the hair 2 inch and unwind hair.Repeat technique.Continue until all the hair has been styled, always styling away from the face.Caution: Keep out of reach of children.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Section hair and take a 2-inch section.At the root, press to open iron with cool tip facing upwards and wrap hair.Rotate iron one full turn so the hair is wrapped around fully.Glide down the hair 2 inch and unwind hair.Repeat technique.Continue until all the hair has been styled, always styling away from the face.Caution: Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Nice sturdy cord that is comfortable and doesn't get in the way. Good grip and easy to use. Heated up quickly which is ideal for a quick style and go situation. Seems durable and strong.

reviews.headline: Great performance, heat and very sleek
reviews.comments: I've been looking for a new curling iron and this one really fits all my needs - it's easy to use, warms up quickly, and creates beautiful curls that hold well throughout the day. It also has a very sleek design!

reviews.headline: Easy curls
reviews.comments: I never do my hair but this curling iron is so easy to use. It heats up in literal seconds and only takes one pass to give the prettiest curl. I used it with extensions and I was able to do my whole head in less than 15 minutes. It lasted an entire night out and I used very little product to hold the curls. I also love what it comes with a glove to protect your hand!

reviews.headline: Simple and Smooth!
reviews.comments: Immediately as I opened the box I was in awe of how beautiful this curling iron is. I've always been interested in GHD so being able to test this product was the icing on the cake! I absolutely love how smooth and simple it is. I'm not very good at curling my hair but I'm sure once I get the hang of it I'll use it much more often! I love that it has an auto off switch, makes it so much easier if I forget to turn it off.

reviews.headline: Great Modern Curling Iron
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Ten to fifteen years ago I was curling my hair 2-3 times per week, but now I find myself lucky if I style my hair 2-3 times per year. The products used have changed so much that I've been nervous to step back into the ring, but the ghd Chronos Curve Grand Iron - 1.25" made the process much smoother. My hair type has changed drastically since having kids so I wasn't even sure how the curls would turn out, but I'm pretty impressed with the result!  A few of my favorite parts of this iron are that 1- the power switch makes it nearly impossible to accidentally turn it off while curling your hair, 2- the wands shape and cord input make it very easy to change the direction in which you're curling your hair, and 3- the iron is preset to a certain temperature making it difficult to burn your hair to a crisp. Lastly, I tried my curls both with and without the clamp and noticed near identical tendrils each time. Previous irons left marks where I clamped my hair down, but these curls had a flawless finish. I also appreciated the heat protectant glide included, even though I haven't yet used it.

reviews.headline: I LOVE this product!!!
reviews.comments: I highly recommend this curling iron. It did a great job on my curly thick hair. I can't wait to use it this weekend for a wedding hairstyle! I had been using my old curling iron for years, and this is such a worthy replacement. Well made, feels like it's made to last!

reviews.headline: Only if you're looking for amazing long lasting curls!!
reviews.comments: This curling iron is amazing! It gives a long lasting curl with definition and shine! The sleek feel of the barrel is amazing! I truly recommend this curling iron! It works great on both short and long hair. The length of the cord gives great flexibility to work with. It's perfect!

reviews.headline: Worth the investment
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The BHD Cronos Curved 1.25 inch curling iron delivers smooth, voluminous consistent, even heat, distributing curls with ease. Its unique curved barrel naturally guides hair for effortless styling, while the fast, even heat-up ensures long-lasting results without frizz. Lightweight and comfortable to use, it's perfect for creating both loose waves and polished curls. Its extremely durable as well. 

.

reviews.headline: Worth the investment
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The BHD Cronos Curved 1.25 inch curling iron delivers smooth, voluminous consistent, even heat, distributing curls with ease. Its unique curved barrel naturally guides hair for effortless styling, while the fast, even heat-up ensures long-lasting results without frizz. Lightweight and comfortable to use, it's perfect for creating both loose waves and polished curls. Its extremely durable as well.

reviews.headline: Love this curling iron
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love this curling iron! The GHD Chronos Curve heats up super fast and gives me bouncy curls that actually last. It's really easy to use, and my hair looks like I just left the salon. Totally worth it if you curl your hair often!

reviews.headline: Solid curling iron
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Nice size for soft waves. Easy to use. Feels well made. My only complaint is that you can't adjust the heat setting. I think this is a good option for long and short hair. Can give a polished look or a fun, tousled bend in the hair.

reviews.headline: Good Product, but Not for the Price
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This curling iron is very sleek and is definitely made with high quality material and elegance. The hair glides smoothly through the wand and never gets caught. The cord has a great length making it more accessible and the curling iron doesn't feel heavy in the hand. It heats up within seconds and turns on with just the simple push of a button. However, nothing about this curling iron truly made me believe it is worth over $200. I mean it does what any other curling iron does, if not less. There's only one heat setting and the number isn't even explicitly made known. If you want to invest a little more in a good curling iron, I fear this is not the product to buy. This curling iron is very good but I'm sure there are better options out there. You're mostly paying for packaging and brand with this product.

reviews.headline: Fast, snag-free curler for effortless waves
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really enjoy using the ghd Chronos Curve. The design is super sleek and smooth, and unlike other curlers I've tried, my hair never snags in the clamp as I twist. My favorite way to use it is for effortless, beachy waves — it literally takes me about 2 minutes to style my whole head. The tool also heats up in just 10 seconds, so it's ready to go almost instantly, which is a huge plus.

That said, I wish it had adjustable heat settings. The single high temperature can feel a bit drying, and I worry about long-term damage on finer hair types. I think this curler would be best suited for people with thicker hair who need that extra heat.

reviews.headline: Obsessed!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product is incredibly easy to use and creates beautiful, long-lasting curls. Although it has a clamp, I use it like a wand curler. It features a single heat setting, which I actually prefer. My hair never feels burnt and always ends up bouncy and shiny. The tool is lightweight and has a conveniently long cord.

reviews.headline: Great hair tool
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] At first I was skeptical about not being able to adjust the heat, but I found that it doesn't matter at all! The curling iron heats up in seconds and curls so well! I feel like it is made very well and the curls it makes are perfect!

reviews.headline: Worth the upgrade
reviews.comments: I love how sleek this hair curler is! The blue lights and the way it alerts you when it's turns on is a nice perk. The heat is great and didn't feel like it was too hot and was effective to curl my stubborn hair. The time it took to curl my hair was dramatically cut which saves so much time!

reviews.headline: Good, not great
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I'm typically a fan of GHD tools but this curling iron was just okay for me! Design wise, it's very sleek & heats up quickly! I don't use clamp curling irons very often, but I did not have any issues with use. My hair never got stuck even with a regular barrel length. However I felt my curls did not last as well as they do with other irons despite different methods of curling. I think for the price, there are other options that are just as good for less!

reviews.headline: Great curling iron!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I'm terrible with curling irons but this was really easy to use! The design is really sleek and intuitive and I like the size of the curls it creates. It does heat up quickly, so be careful!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I am absolutely in love with this classic iron one inch. It is so perfect for my hair. The heat settings make it so amazing and perfect for what I need. The design is cute and comfortable to use at the same time. It's so versatile and so durable, and the design is absolutely amazing and adorable. It is so high-tech looking and with it coming with the heat glove. I wish it did have a cooling mat. That is my one issue, but it is truly one of the best I have tried and does do very well on coarse hair, so it's amazing. I definitely recommend it.

[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]
 Love this product! Pictured above is my normal hair and then day 2 of curls without any styling product prior or hairspray. Usually my hair has a tough time holding any shape, so this was great! The wand is easy to use too since there's only an on button and it beeps/glows once heated up - which only takes about 15 seconds!

faceoff_positive.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This curling iron is hands down the best I've ever used. It has a sleek, elegant design that is light weight and feels very comfortable in the hand when styling the hair. When turning it on it has a little tune that is played and the light around the on/off switch lights up along with a light around the bottom of the curling iron; these lights blink until the curling iron is heated fully and then they stay solid. It takes less than a minute to heat completely and the hair does not need to stay on the barrel long to be curled, which is perfect for those days when you are in a hurry to get ready and out the door. Upon styling the design of the barrel creates the most beautiful and perfect curls and depending on the amount of hair in each section you can easily achieve loose beachy waves or a classy defined curl. This curling iron works great on all different textures of hair as I tried it on my hair and both of my daughters' hair. I have fine long and curly hair, my youngest has medium texture long straight hair, and my oldest has shoulder length thick, straight hair and the curling iron was amazing to use on all of our hair creating perfect curls that held all day. The only slight issues I have with this product is that I usually like my styling tools to have a function that allows you to set it to a specific temperature but this one does not, other than that I am completely satisfied with it. It is a little on the pricey side but I feel that it is well worth the price and would gladly purchase it myself. I highly recommend this curling iron if you curl your hair often.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Curling Iron on the Market

faceoff_negative.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I was recently sent this new curling iron for free in exchange for my honest review. I have used curling wands and irons for about 2 decades at this point. This might be one of the worst curling irons I've ever used. My first impression was high…the packaging feels solid and luxurious and the iron itself is heavy and feels very sleek. There is one on/off button and the iron beeps when it's fully heated which I appreciate. That's where the positives end for me though. First, there is no temperature control. At 365 degrees, it's much hotter than the 250 degrees I typically use on my hair. Another issue I had was the size of the barrel. Maybe I'm just accustomed to using a long barrel for my long hair but this feels much shorter than any other wand or iron I've used. The barrel itself has an odd coating on it that causes my hair to drag and pull as I use it and I notice several strands of hair being pulled out during each use. Lastly, this curling iron makes my hair so stringy and flat which is not something I ever struggle with. It's similar to how it feels after straightening and I prefer weightless volume in my hair. Overall, I'm SUPER disappointed in this product and I'll stick with my preferred curling iron that costs over half the price of this GHD one.
faceoff_negative.headline: Terrible all around
